關.definition: mountain pass; to close; to shut; to turn off; to confine; to lock (sb) up; to shut (sb in a room, a bird in a cage etc); to concern; to involve

關上.definition: to close (a door); to turn off (light, electrical equipment etc)

關云長.definition: courtesy name of 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3]

關你屁事.definition: (coll.) None of your goddamn business!; Mind your own business!

關係.definition: relation; relationship; to concern; to affect; to have to do with; guanxi; CL:個|个[ge4]

關係戶.definition: a connection (sb with whom one has dealings on the basis of "scratch my back and I'll scratch yours")

關係網.definition: network of people with whom one has dealings on the basis of "scratch my back and I'll scratch yours"

關停.definition: (of a power plant, refinery etc) to shut down

關公.definition: Lord Guan (i.e. 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3])

關公面前耍大刀.pinyin: guān gōng miàn qián shuǎ dà dāo
關公面前耍大刀.definition: lit. to wield the broadsword in the presence of Lord Guan (idiom); fig. to make a fool of oneself by showing off in front of an expert

關切.definition: to be deeply concerned; to be troubled (by)

關卡.definition: checkpoint (for taxation, security etc); barrier; hurdle; red tape; CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

關嚴.definition: to close (a window) completely; to shut (a door) properly; to turn off (a faucet) tightly

關塞.definition: border fort, esp. defending narrow valley

關外.definition: beyond the pass, i.e. the region north and east of Shanhai Pass 山海關|山海关[Shan1 hai3 guan1] or the region west of Jiayu Pass 嘉峪關|嘉峪关[Jia1 yu4 guan1] or both

關山.definition: fortresses and mountains (along the Great Wall); one's hometown

關山鎮.definition: Guanshan or Kuanshan town in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

關嶺布依族苗族自治縣.pinyin: guān lǐng bù yī zú miáo zú zì zhì xiàn
關嶺布依族苗族自治縣.definition: Guanling Buyei and Hmong autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou

關嶺縣.definition: Guanling Buyei and Hmong autonomous county in Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou

關店歇業.definition: to close up shop and cease business temporarily; closed for business

關廟.definition: Guanmiao, a district in Tainan 台南|台南[Tai2 nan2], Taiwan

關廠.definition: to shut down (a factory); to close a facility; a lockout

關張.definition: (of a shop) to close down; to go out of business

關征.definition: customs levy; customs post charging import duties

關心.definition: to be concerned about; to care about

關愛.definition: to show concern and care for

關懷.definition: care; solicitude; to show care for; concerned about; attentive to

關懷備至.definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way

關押.definition: to imprison; to lock up (in jail)

關掉.definition: to switch off; to shut off

關文.definition: official document sent to an agency (or an official) of equal rank (in imperial times)

關於.definition: pertaining to; concerning; with regard to; about; a matter of

關東.definition: Northeast China; Manchuria; lit. east of Shanhai Pass 山海關|山海关[Shan1 hai3 guan1]; Kantō region of Japan

關東地震.definition: Kantō earthquake of 1923, magnitude 8.2, that killed 200,000 people in the Tokyo area

關東煮.definition: oden, Japanese dish made with boiled eggs, processed fish cakes, daikon radish, tofu etc in a kelp-based broth

關東軍.definition: Japanese Kwantung army (or Kantō army), notorious for numerous atrocities in China during WWII

關格.definition: blocked or painful urination, constipation and vomiting (Chinese medicine)

關機.definition: to turn off (a machine or device); to finish shooting a film

關注.definition: to pay attention to; to follow sth closely; to follow (on social media); concern; interest; attention

關涉.definition: to relate (to); to concern; to involve; connection; relationship

關漢卿.definition: Guan Hanqing (c. 1235-c. 1300), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家

關照.definition: to take care; to keep an eye on; to look after; to tell; to remind

關禁閉.definition: to put in detention (a soldier, a pupil)

關稅與貿易總協定.pinyin: guān shuì yǔ mào yì zǒng xié dìng
關稅與貿易總協定.definition: GATT, the 1995 General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade

關穎珊.definition: Michelle Kwan (1980-), former American figure skater, Olympic medalist

關節囊.definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)

關系.definition: variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]

關緊.definition: to close firmly; to fasten securely; to make fast; to lock

關羽.definition: Guan Yu (-219), general of Shu and blood-brother of Liu Bei in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, fearsome fighter famous for virtue and loyalty; posthumously worshipped and identified with the guardian Bodhisattva Sangharama

關聯.definition: to be related; to be connected; relationship; connection

關西.definition: Kansai region, Japan; Guanxi or Kuanhsi town in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

關西鎮.definition: Guanxi or Kuanhsi town in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

關說.definition: to speak on sb's behalf; to intercede for sb; to lobby illegally

關貿總協定.definition: GATT, the 1995 General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade

關連.definition: variant of 關聯|关联[guan1 lian2]

關金券.definition: Chinese customs gold unit, currency used in China between 1930 and 1948

關鍵.definition: crucial point; crux; CL:個|个[ge4]; key; crucial; pivotal

關鍵績效指標.pinyin: guān jiàn jī xiào zhǐ biāo

關門.definition: to close a door; to lock a door; (of a shop etc) to close (for the night, or permanently)

關門大吉.definition: to close down a business for good and put the best face on it (idiom)

關門打狗.definition: lit. shut the door and beat the dog (idiom); fig. seal off the enemy's avenue of retreat, then strike hard

關門捉賊.definition: to catch a thief by closing his escape route (idiom)

關閉.definition: to close; to shut (a window etc); (of a shop, school etc) to shut down

關關難過，關關過.pinyin: guān guān nán guò ， guān guān guò
關關難過，關關過.definition: to meet with great difficulties but pull through

關防.definition: security measures (esp. border security); official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)

關餉.definition: to receive one's salary; to pay sb's wages
